name: Chasm Phantasm
description:
Made for the Cult of Jabrils Stay@Home Jam.

*Don't let the phantasms escape the chasm!

*A and D to rotate the turret

*Left mouse click to fire

As you move, you lose energy, causing you to move slower. Firing your weapon increases the cooldown.

This game was created in roughly three hours and recorded the process. I'll update this description with a Youtube link if I manage to render it decently.

I used sound effects from GlitchMachines. Some I modified using Reaper to better suit the game. You can view their license here: https://glitchmachines.com/legal/
